      Game​(Team teamOne, Team teamTwo, ServerModel serverModel)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        Game​(Team teamOne,
     Team teamTwo,
     ServerModel serverModel)
        Game will be started from ServerModel as soon as 4 player are connected to server Game-Object ist able to communicate via broadcast to all clients
        Parameters:
        teamOne - the first team created by the ServerModel
        teamTwo - the second team created by the ServerModel
        serverModel - to have access to serverModel.broadcast()

      • setCurrentPlayer

        public void setCurrentPlayer​(int currentPlayer)

      • start

        public void start()
        Method that starts the game. It organizes the players of both teams in the order of play. Sends a customized GameStartedMsg to every player. And then shuffles the deck

      • startMatch

        protected void startMatch()
        starts a new Match in a game
